Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Following GEM - P , 5 - year progression - free survival was 46 % ( 95 % confidence interval ( CI ) , 30 - 62 % ) and 5 - year overall survival was 59 % ( 95 % CI , 43 - 74 % ) .

Let's think step by step.

The paragraph mentions two types of survival rates:

1. Progression-free survival (PFS)
2. Overall survival (OS)

Therefore, the "Disease" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Progression-free survival (PFS)
2. Overall survival (OS)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Sure, my apologies for the mistake. Here are the revised "Disease" entities in the paragraph:

1. Progression-free survival (PFS)

The paragraph only mentions Progression-free survival (PFS) as a disease entity. Overall survival (OS) is not considered a disease entity in this context, as it refers to the survival rate of patients with a specific disease, rather than the disease itself.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the valid "Disease" entity in the paragraph presented in a Markdown table:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Progression-free survival (PFS) |

The paragraph mentions two types of survival:

Neither of these entities can be considered chemical entities.
